name: school-communicator-ui
description: This is me trying to learn Elm. Also supported by React and ES6. It will become an app for parent/teacher/student communication and work tracking.

scripts.browserify: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/*.js -o build/app.js
scripts.build: npm run build-elm && npm run browserify

author: Barnaby Claydon
